headline: Comcast Board And Community Moves Reframe Broadband And Wireless Investment Story
summary: Comcast (NasdaqGS:CMCSA) has appointed Gordon Smith to its Audit Committee, strengthening its board-level financial oversight structure. The company is expanding its community presence with a new Lift Zone created in partnership with a youth organization. Comcast is also growing its retail footprint through the opening of new Xfinity Stores. For you as an investor, Comcast sits at the intersection of broadband, media, and wireless services, areas that continue to see strong demand for high...
